actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Leahy, Committee on the Judiciary, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 13.
Motion to proceed to nomination considered in Senate.
By unanimous consent agreement, that with respect to the cloture motion filed, the mandatory quorum required under Rule XXII be waived.
By unanimous consent agreement, debate and vote on cloture motion on 3/6/2013.
Cloture not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51
Motion by Senator Reid to reconsider the vote by which cloture was not invoked (Roll Call No. 30) in Senate.
name: Caitlin Joan Halligan
nominee: Caitlin Joan Halligan, of New York, to be United States Circuit Judge for the District of Columbia Circuit
position: United States Circuit Judge for the District of Columbia Circuit
